string-array.name: updates
string-array.item: V 1.23\n- Added custom number \n- Option to whitelist with numbers in contacts
Usage: Click setting from main screen then turn On/Off from main screen
Setup spam filter: click on setting/blacklist button, then type unwanted numbers/contacts or import from call log/sms. Next, define keywords to filter out.
Set up whitelist: setting/whitelist button to define un-block numbers
Set up private filter: Click on private button, then set up password. The keyword and number list are the same to spam filter.
- May be conflict with other SMS app such as Go SMS, Handcent, or SMS Popup
